name: Terra Toy
description:
Terra Toy is a simple and peaceful creative sandbox where you sculpt terrain and place down objects to create the scenic planet of your dreams. There is no goal or game; Build whatever you wish simply for the beauty of it using the easy-to-use tools and extensive library of decorations.



Sculpt and terraform the terrain, raising it to erect hills and mountains, lowering it to reveal valleys and rivers, and smoothing it to achieve a photogenic finish.



Paint a colorful set of biomes onto the planet, creating varying environments and adding a sense of diversity and structure.



Place props to add detail and life to the world, choosing among many unique items to customize and plop onto the ground.



Take screenshots of your planet to share with your friends, or just simply sit around and watch the sun rise and the rain fall on your cozy little planet.
